alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:16AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tulare County through 445 AM PDT... At 415 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ducor, or 11 miles south of Porterville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Terra Bella, Ducor, Poplar-Cotton Center, Woodville, East Porterville and Strathmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. Aightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
